note.p: Zoologist. Studied medicine and zoology at Pisa; at Paris, 1861–5. Professor of natural history and director of the Museum of Natural History at Genoa, 1865–7; professor of zoology and comparative anatomy, Genoa, 1867–71; Bologna, 1871–80; Naples, from 1881.
American Naturalist 31 (1897): 479, Bollettino della Societá dei Naturalisti in Napoli 22 (1907–8): 119–32.
